definition[0]: to hit someone very hard with your hand closed
example[0]: If you don’t shut up, I’m going to thump you!
example[1]: She thumped the table with her fist.
example[2]: His feet thumped loudly on the bare boards.
example[3]: He thumped his cup down on the table.
definition[2]: to walk or run with your feet making a loud heavy sound as they touch the ground
example[4]: Stella came thumping down the stairs.
definition[3]: if your heart thumps, it beats very strongly and quickly because you are frightened or excited
example[5]: My heart was thumping inside my chest.
definition[4]: the dull sound that is made when something hits a surface
example[6]: The box fell to the floor with a thump.
definition[5]: an action in which you hit someone or something
example[7]: If he does that again, I’ll give him a good thump.
